import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { PDFDownloadLink } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Document, Page, Text, View, StyleSheet } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import './StudentDashboard.css'; const StudentDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Initialize navigation const [resumeData, setResumeData] = useState({ fullName: '', mobile: '', email: '', education: '', workExperience: '', skills: '', }); const handleViewJobs = () => { navigate('/jobs'); // Navigate to the job listings page }; const handleChange = (e) => { setResumeData({ ...resumeData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const generateResume = ( {resumeData.fullName} {resumeData.mobile} | {resumeData.email} Education {resumeData.education} Work Experience {resumeData.workExperience} Skills {resumeData.skills} ); return (

Welcome, Student!

Manage your career path with the tools below:

Job Listings

Browse and apply for the latest job opportunities suited for your profile.

Resume Builder

Access and update your resume with the latest achievements and experiences.

Application Status

Track the status of your job applications in real-time.

Internship Opportunities

Explore internship programs to gain valuable industry experience.
